scripts.publish:lib: yarn run build  &&  cd _npm-lib  &&  npm publish
scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "
Run 'yarn run publishdist' to publish this package

"  && exit 1
scripts.build: yarn install  &&  yarn run -T tsc --noEmit  &&  node build.mjs  &&  yarn run test
scripts.dev: yarn install  &&  yarn run -T concurrently "tsc --noEmit --watch --preserveWatchOutput"  "node build.mjs --dev"  "yarn run test:dev"
scripts.test:dev: sleep 1  &&  (yarn run test || true)  &&  yarn run test:watch
scripts.test:watch: yarn run -T onchange '__tests/**/*.tests--*.js' -f add -f change -- yarn run -T ospec '{{file}}'
